title: Editing an Existing Patient View
body:
This article will go through the process of editing Patient Views:
1. From within the Patients homepage, click Views.
2. Click the box next to the name for the view to reveal additional options. Click Edit.
3. Update with any required changes to the search clauses or search range.
4. Once finished, click Save to apply the changes. 

The saved view has now been edited.
